sinks.name: TEE_Free
sinks.reason: Missing input validation could lead to undefined behavior if a tainted pointer is passed.

sinks.name: TEE_Malloc
sinks.reason: Missing input validation on size parameter could lead to buffer overflow or excessive memory allocation.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Destination buffer could be shared with Normal World, leading to exposure of tainted data.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Size parameter could be manipulated, leading to buffer overflows or out-of-bounds access.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Source buffer could be shared with Normal World, leading to exposure of tainted data.
